info.title: PSD II services
info.description:
# Introduction
 

> This page contains the documentation on how to use Temenos Sandbox through API calls.

> 

# Authentication
When you sign up for an account, you are given your first API key. You authenticate to the
TEMENOS API by providing your secret key in the request header.

Never share your secret keys. Keep them guarded and secure.

tags.name: Payments

PSD II Payment services 

> APIs to create and manage various types of payments such as recurring, SEPA and cross border payments.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of ThreeDSecure entries

parameters.name: cardIssueId
parameters.description: The identifier of the issued card, consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: issueDate
parameters.description: The date the item was issued.

parameters.name: expiryDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

parameters.name: cardStatus
parameters.description: The status of the card

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: cardIssueId
parameters.description: The identifier of the issued card, consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

get.summary: Updates additional payment information for payment initiation requests
get.description: Updates additional payment information for payment initiation requests made through PSD2 APIs. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'Update PSU data for payment initiation and Update PSU Data for payment initiation cancellation' published API in accordance to open banking standards.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.summary: Payment initiation for cross border credit transfers.
post.description: Creates a payment order request initiation for cross border credit transfers.For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'Payment Initiation Request' published API in accordance to open banking standards to create a payment.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

get.summary: Retrieves the details of the payment
get.description: Retrieves the payment status and all the necessary details of the payment specified with paymentId. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'Get Payment Information and Payment initiation status request' published API in accordance to open banking standards to fetch the payment details.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

post.summary: Payment initiation for a SEPA credit transfer
post.description: Creates a SEPA payment credit transfer request.For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'Payment Initiation Request' published API in accordance to open banking standards to create a SEPA payment.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.summary: Initiates creation of SEPA standing order instruction
post.description: Creates a standing order (periodic) payment initation request for SEPA credit transfers. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'createSepaPayment' published API in accordance to open banking standards to create a periodic payment.

parameters.name: standingOrderId
parameters.description: The unique standing order identifier

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.summary: Initiates creation of standing order instruction
post.description: Creates a standing order(periodic) payment initiation request for cross border credit transfers. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'createPeriodicPayment' published API in accordance to open banking standards to create a periodic payment.

parameters.name: standingOrderId
parameters.description: The unique standing order identifier

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: standingOrderId
parameters.description: The unique standing order identifier

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.summary: Creates the standing order instruction request
post.description: Creates the standing order (periodic) payment instruction from the initiated request

parameters.name: standingOrderId
parameters.description: The unique standing order identifier

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.description: Creates the funds transfer payment from the initiated transfer request

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

get.description: Retrieves the sub resource information for a particular payment. For PSD2, this API is used by 'get Authorisations', 'get SCA Status of payment authorisations', 'get SCA status of payment cancellations' and 'getcancellations' published APIs in accordance to open banking standards.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

parameters.name: subResourceType
parameters.description: Indicates if the sub resource is created for authorization or cancellation of the PSD2 payment. Can contain values 'AUTH' or 'CANC' which indicates authorization and cancellation respectively.

parameters.name: subResourceId
parameters.description: Contains the sub resource identifier which is constructed of the payment Id, status of the payment and sequence number during authorisation or deletion of a payment. Applies to both implicit & explicit payment workflows. For example: FT0003003-AUTH-1

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

delete.summary: Cancels a payment that has been initiated
delete.description: Cancels a payment request that was initiated and updates the transaction status to CANC. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'deletePayment' published API in accordance to open banking standards to delete an unauthorised payment.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

post.description: Updates the entity record for the entity identified by the global urn. For PSD2 this API can be linked to "updateOBDNotification" published API in accordance to open banking standards to update the entity record.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

delete.description: Consent initiation and deletion. For PSD2, this API can be linked to 'initiateConsent' published API in accordance to open banking standards.

parameters.name: validate_only

put.description: Consent authorization. For PSD2, this API can be linked to 'approveConsent' published API in accordance to open banking standards.

get.description: Retrieves entire consent record. For PSD2, this API can be linked to 'get consent status request' published API in accordance to open banking standards.

parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

get.description: Retrieves status of the consent record. For PSD2, this API can be linked to 'get consent status request' published API in accordance to open banking standards.

parameters.name: page_size

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves the consent information and status of TPP
get.description: Retrieves the detailed consent information along with the status of third party payment provider, with specified consent id, consent status and customer. For PSD2 this API can be linked to 'getConsentData' published API in accordance to open banking standards to return details of all consents.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.
